TopicTitle: The Asteroid Sentinels: A KSP Graphic Novel (Series 8 Episode 10: Finale!)

Articles.Content: Nice intercept! You know, i have KER but I always forget about target mode. Will be interesting to see the mass on that rock. I suppose since you're just trying to miss Kerbin you just need to give it a strong push in one direction, right? Or are you going for capture?
I'm going for a capture, the relative speed of the asteroid is actually kinda low, which is why I have enough Delta V for capture.

Here's a 3 Pager, "Ha! 90% Ore!". ADM is about to claw it... Mortimer, is in a mood for a delicious undertaking of plans, and while saving the world might be a short push away (for now), saving the KSC from paper pushers is not.

![C6Dt8V4.png](http://imgur.com/C6Dt8V4.png)![3QGCRnW.png](http://imgur.com/3QGCRnW.png)![xOMMrSl.png](http://imgur.com/xOMMrSl.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-17T01:18:32Z" title="09/17/2015 01:18  AM" data-short="8 yr">September 17, 2015</time> by SaturnianBlue**
+1 for "final countdown" ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Here's the next entry. The Kerbals find themselves igniting the rockets on ADM, and set their sites to save the planet (or at least a chuck of it).

![CulZ4Wm.png](http://imgur.com/CulZ4Wm.png)

![7CfmIzv.png](http://imgur.com/7CfmIzv.png)![GAUdweB.png](http://imgur.com/GAUdweB.png)

I wouldn't expect gene to say "May the force be with us!"

I would think werner or someone in the science team saying it. Because nerds. Mission control seems less likely to say it.

> 
> I wouldn't expect gene to say "May the force be with us!"
> I would think werner or someone in the science team saying it. Because nerds. Mission control seems less likely to say it.

You know, I wouldn't think you'd be wrong, but it's likely all have some level of neediness after all.

Here's ARM's approach "Panic". The approach of ARM is going all and fine, until someone starts a commotion...

![Vfu8SFR.png](http://i.imgur.com/Vfu8SFR.png)![6CPYe3u.png](http://i.imgur.com/6CPYe3u.png)![FTGXdu7.png](http://i.imgur.com/FTGXdu7.png)![R0QmdOZ.png](http://i.imgur.com/R0QmdOZ.png)

Also, we've officially hit 4000 views! Thanks for all the support!

Alright S4E6. The Kerbals try to proceed with the attachment.![KbfOja7.png](http://i.imgur.com/KbfOja7.png)![ATxcPo1.png](http://i.imgur.com/ATxcPo1.png)![0vJD4X9.png](http://i.imgur.com/0vJD4X9.png)Does anyone have feedback?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-24T02:09:19Z" title="09/24/2015 02:09  AM" data-short="8 yr">September 24, 2015</time> by SaturnianBlue**

Sorry for the lack of activity and entries, school and especially laptop sharing has taken a toll on the production of this series, and while I'll get one entry ASAP, it might be a few days. I don't really know what to improve on this series as well, though I do have an idea of what I want to do, it's still to be done.

Here's a 1 pager (yes seriously), I haven't had much time to do these recently, and I'll make an attempts to come back. Also coinciding with my absence is the delay in the Sentinel Space Telescope. ;( Also, that 4th wall has been bugging me a bit.![BOkhZCn.png](http://i.imgur.com/BOkhZCn.png)
So what do you think? Any feedback? Any suggestions?
haha... 2001 reference

> 
> haha... 2001 reference

I do believe the actual quote is I'm sorry Dave, I can't do that, but it's popularized as else ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

S4B1, a press conference is called as numerous small events have happened since ARM has docked with the asteroid, and the big four of the astronauts are acting very suspiciously.![ocvmQGr.png](https://i.imgur.com/ocvmQGr.png)

![ZIXCWQU.gif](https://i.imgur.com/ZIXCWQU.gif)

![aStRsv0.png](https://i.imgur.com/aStRsv0.png)![bx73hhw.png](https://i.imgur.com/bx73hhw.png)![YsFKS2G.png](https://i.imgur.com/YsFKS2G.png)

So what do you guys think? Do you like how S4B is going?

6000 views! Thank you! I decided to do the whole press conference thing because I decided actually showing it "live" was boring, having done it countless times.

Of course, this was also my first use of Kerbal Animation Suite. The big four of the astronauts are in, I figured that since IRL ARM would be docked with an Orion capsule, I decided to implement them. Astronauts on missions also provide better development instead of kerbals disconnected from the ship, and I've noticed this has worked well and is used on most graphic novels, which reminds me: I technically have the record for the longest time without a crewed mission in a graphic novel in IRL time, and maybe KSP time?

Also in the thought process: Doomsday comet plot for series 6-7.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-18T16:24:28Z" title="10/18/2015 04:24  PM" data-short="8 yr">October 18, 2015</time> by SaturnianBlue**

The KSC Press Conference is over, and Jeb begins to explain his daring plan to get science and try and defy Mortimer Kerman.![yotxYzn.png](http://i.imgur.com/yotxYzn.png)![OJywVyz.png](http://i.imgur.com/OJywVyz.png)![fWiAlKM.png](http://i.imgur.com/fWiAlKM.png)![Ifcb94Q.png](http://i.imgur.com/Ifcb94Q.png)

For largely unimportant events that happen slowly, do you thing Press Conferences are a good way of condensing those events? What do you think of the Jebediah Master Plan? Do you think introducing kerbonauts into the story is a good idea? How are my car making skills? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Alright! Series 4 B3 is now up! This is to be the third to last entry of my single longest series, Series 4. The construction of the Minmus refinery and Asteroid hotel seem to be whole and jolly, but several changes are made, and an insight into the space program is revealed.

![a0enr3J.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/a0enr3J.jpg)![lZvVck5.png](http://i.imgur.com/lZvVck5.png)![z8ghkUV.png](http://i.imgur.com/z8ghkUV.png)

What do you all think about newspapers as a way of a sort of insight into the KSC? What do you think happens next? Do you agree with Mort? How is your opinion of the Jedediah master plan?

Jebediah Kerman (In Blue) has a quiet but moving discussion in the meeting rooms of the Administration building with his adversary (In crimson-gold). This one's short but an important point to give Jeb and his crew members a bit more character and meaning.![KQZ9l2b.png](http://i.imgur.com/KQZ9l2b.png)![DifknLB.png](http://i.imgur.com/DifknLB.png)Do you like the meeting room? Would you like it to be used again? How was the discussion? What do you think of the morality of both characters? Also notable 7000 views! Thank you for keeping a slow to unfold but long running webcomic alive!
I hope to release The Asteroid Sentinels Series 4B Finale today or tomorow, currently doing the mission now!

Sadly due to a busier than expected day and some strangeness when loading crafts in my save (game crashes while loading already launched crafts,) expect nothing today. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

The finale of Series 4 has come! It's by far the longest series, at 12 entries! Wernher initiates the entry into Mun orbit for ARM, Val makes note of plans and explanations. Finally, the Hotel-Refinery is... Well, you'll need to find out! 

![SSNCTGZ.png](http://i.imgur.com/SSNCTGZ.png)![eZy3RS1.png](http://i.imgur.com/eZy3RS1.png)![qcXSiyV.png](http://i.imgur.com/qcXSiyV.png)![yGjNXgL.png](http://i.imgur.com/yGjNXgL.png)![saUbdVk.png](http://i.imgur.com/saUbdVk.png)![z3kCJ6Y.png](http://i.imgur.com/z3kCJ6Y.png)

There you have it! The end to series 4! It's also the first time i've depicted Mort and Subeth Kerman. I drew/edited them in SketchbookExpress, the simple art program that came with my drawing tablet. Mr. Signalman is finally in the series. ARM, ADM, and the new launch (Mission: Very Possible) will all be back in Series 5. There won't be any interludes between series 4-5. Btw, the red Mustang is back!

What did you think of the series? Do you like the crew? Was it a nice finale?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-07T18:59:48Z" title="11/07/2015 06:59  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 7, 2015</time> by SaturnianBlue**

Hooray! 8000 views! I'm also updating the first post to include all of series 4. I still haven't gotten ksp 1.0.5 downloaded (Macs don't recognize Squad, and i'm not the admin account), and the next one I'd prefer be in 1.0.5, so while most of the mission is done, not all of it is.

Also, I'd like a sprinkle of feedback on what bits you like about series 4, so I can improve series 5.

EDIT: Series 4/4B added to the first page for those who'd prefer reading it in imgur without the forum things.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-12T01:44:22Z" title="11/12/2015 01:44  AM" data-short="8 yr">November 12, 2015</time> by SaturnianBlue**

The start of Series 5 begins with the "MVP" (Mission : Very Possible) launching into the skies above the KSC... But Mort's not ready to give up yet, and Jeb is rolling on with the mission. 

4 Page series introductory entry.

![90AOzra.png](http://i.imgur.com/90AOzra.png)

![AnG7yQm.png](http://i.imgur.com/AnG7yQm.png)![H4T1cl0.png](http://i.imgur.com/H4T1cl0.png)![CsmTZFR.png](http://i.imgur.com/CsmTZFR.png)

How was Jeb and Mort? How was the format for you? How was the mood for the entry?

 Oh and yes, I changed the logo a bit. 

> 
>  For those who like munching on outside references, Spaceballs gets a mention with "We Brake For Nobody", 
> 
> and Doctor Who in the style of "Harry Sullivan is an imbecile!"

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-15T19:12:43Z" title="11/15/2015 07:12  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 15, 2015</time> by SaturnianBlue**

So, Mort can send commands to a rocket in flight that neither Gene in Mission Control nor the pilots on board can do anything about? \*shudder\*

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-15T19:23:56Z" title="11/15/2015 07:23  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 15, 2015</time> by Kuzzter**

> 
> So, Mort can ses commands to a rocket in flight that neither Gene in Mission Control nor the pilots on board can do anything about? \*shudder\*

The pilots can do the same thing Mort can do, but why? Mort of course uses power via fear naturally, he might want to protect lives of Kerbals, but he wouldn't mind firing a few!

RSO can't be aborted or overridden quickly enough, unless you are Mr Master Hacker, which Bill isn't... Mort ordered some commands to be irreversible from space too... \*gulp\*
